rukus.text: 37|139|Va, hatman, Junus [niz] jake az pajomʙaroni [Mo] ʙud
37|140|[Jod kun az] hangome ki [ xasmgin az kufri qavmas, ʙiduni icozati Parvardigor] ʙa kistii anʙosta [az musofir va ʙor] gurext
37|141|Pas, [cun kisti dar holi ƣarq sudan ʙud, Junus hamrohi musofiron ʙaroi ʙerun andoxtani ʙarxe afrod] qur'a andoxtand va ʙozanda sud [va uro ʙa darjo andoxtand]
37|142|Sipas mohii [ʙuzurge] uro ʙal'id [furu ʙurd], dar hole ki [xudro ʙa xotiri tarki vazifa] sarzanis mekard
37|143|Pas, agar dar zumrai tasʙehgujoni [Parvardigor] naʙud
37|144|Jaqinan, to ruze, ki [mardum] ʙarangexta mesavand, dar sikami on [mohi] ʙoqi memond
37|145|On goh uro dar hole ki [za'if va] ʙemor ʙud ʙa sarzamini xusk [va ʙegijoh] afkandem
37|146|Va ʙar [sari] u ʙutai kadu rujondem [to az soja va mevahojas ʙahra girad]
37|147|Va [duʙora] uro ʙa suji sad hazor nafar jo ʙestar [ʙa risolat] firistodem
37|148|Pas, onon imon ovardand va Mo niz to muddate [az ne'mathoi zindagi] ʙahramandason soxtem
37|149|Pas, az eson [musrikon] ʙipurs, ojo duxtarho ʙaroi Parvardigori tu va pisarho ʙaroi onhost
37|150|Ojo Mo faristagonro duxtar ofaridem va onho huzur dostand
37|151|Ogoh ʙos! Onon az [rui tuhmat va] duruƣgui
37|152|megujand: «Alloh taolo farzand dorad» va, jaqinan, duruƣ megujand
37|153|Ojo [Alloh taolo] duxtaronro ʙar pisaron tarceh dodaast
37|154|Sumoro ci sudaast? Ci guna hukm mekuned
37|155|Ojo [nameandesed va] pand namegired
37|156|Ojo [ʙar iddaoi ʙotili xes] daleli ravsane dored
37|157|Pas, agar rostgued, kitoʙatonro ʙijovared
37|158|[Musrikon] ʙajni U [Alloh taolo] va faristagon, xesovandi qoil sudaand; dar hole ki faristagon ʙa jaqin medonand, ki [musrikon ruzi qijomat ʙaroi hisoʙrasi] ehzor mesavand
37|159|Alloh taolo az on ci [musrikon] tavsif mekunand, munazzah ast
37|160|[Mardum dar tavsifi Parvardigor, suxani gazof megujand] magar ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo
37|161|Pas, sumo [musrikon] va on ci meparasted
37|162|[hargiz] gumrohgari [kase az dini haq] nested
37|163|Magar on ki [ʙa taqdiri ilohi] ahli duzax ʙosad
37|164|Va [faristagon megujand]: « Hec jak az mo nest, magar on ki maqomi musaxxase [dar pesgohi ilohi] dorad
37|165|Moem, ki [ʙaroi parastis va nijois ʙa dargohi Parvardigor] ʙa saf istodaem
37|166|Va ʙe tardid, moem, ki tasʙehgui [U] hastem»
37|167|Va [kofiron, pes az ʙi'sat] hamvora meguftand
37|168|«Agar kitoʙe az [kitoʙhoi osmonii] pesinijon nazdamon ʙud
37|169|jaqinan, az ʙandagoni muxlisi Alloh taolo mesudem»
37|170|Ammo [hangome ki pajomʙar ʙo Qur'on ʙa sujason omad, haqqonijati] onro inkor kardand; pas, ʙa zudi [naticai in korasonro] xohand donist
37|171|Va hatman suxanoni Mo dar ʙorai ʙandagoni firistodaamon az pes sodir sudaast
37|172|Onon, hatman, az coniʙi Mo jori sudaand
37|173|Va ʙe tardid, laskari Mo piruzand
37|174|Pas, [ej Pajomʙar] to muddate az onon [musrikon] ruj ʙigardon
37|175|Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
37|176|Ojo onon azoʙi moro ʙa sitoʙ xostorand
37|177|On goh ki [azoʙi ilohi] ʙar xonahojason furud ojad, ci ʙad ast ʙomdodi husdorjoftagon
37|178|Va to muddate az onon ruj ʙigardon
37|179|Va ononro [dar hangomi nuzuli azoʙ] ʙingar; pas, ʙa zudi xud [niz naticai kufrasonro] xohand did
37|180|Pok va munazzah ast Parvardigorat - Parvardigori izzat va qudrat-az on ci [musrikon ʙa duruƣ] vasf mekunand
37|181|Va salom ʙar pajomʙaron
37|182|Va sipos [va sitois] az oni Alloh taolo- Parvardigori cahonijon- ast
